GE07bhg4c__u:4539: sarvābhir nadībhir āpūryamāṇaṃ santaṃ vṛṣṭy-ādi-prabhavā api sarvā āpaḥ samudraṃ praviśanti

GE07bhg4c__u:19337: yac cānyaj jagad-āśraya-bhūtaṃ kāraṇa-svarūpaṃ jagataś cāvasthā-viśeṣādikaṃ

GE07bhg4c__u:19343: ekasminn evāvayava-rūpeṇa sthitaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ samastaṃ sa-carācaram
GE07bhg4c__u:19345: draṣṭum aśakyam adyādhunaiva paśya he guḍākeśa ! yac cānyaj jaya-parājayādikaṃ draṣṭum icchasi tad api sandehocchedāya paśya ||7||
GE07bhg4c__u:19346: viśvanāthaḥ : paribhramatā tvayā varṣa-koṭibhir api draṣṭum aśakyaṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:19348: iha prastāva ekasminn api mad-dehāvayave tiṣṭhaty ekastham |
GE07bhg4c__u:19349: yac cānyat sva-jaya-parājayādikaṃ ca mamāsmin dehe
GE07bhg4c__u:19351: baladevaḥ : kiṃ ceha mama dehe eka-stham eka-deśa-sthitaṃ sa-carācaraṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:19353: yat tatra tatra paribhramatā tvayā varṣāyutair api draṣṭum aśakyaṃ tadaikadaivaikatraiva mad-anugrahād

GE07bhg4c__u:19359: divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram ||8||

GE07bhg4c__u:19363: mama aiśvaram asādhāraṇaṃ yogam yuktim aghaṭana-ghaṭanā-sāmarthyaṃ paśya ||8||

GE07bhg4c__u:19367: svabhāva-siddhena cakṣuṣā māṃ divya-rūpaṃ draṣṭum na tu śakyase na śaknoṣi

GE07bhg4c__u:19370: sauvādikasyāpi śaknoter daivādikaḥ śyaṃś chāndas iti vā |
GE07bhg4c__u:19372: tarhi tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ kathaṃ śaknuyām ata āha divyam aprākṛtaṃ mama

GE07bhg4c__u:20193: tvayā sad-rūpeṇa sphūraṇa-rūpeṇa ca kāraṇena tataṃ vyāptam idaṃ svataḥ-sattā-sphūrti-śūnyaṃ viśvam kāryaṃ māyika-sambandhenaiva

GE07bhg4c__u:20206: śrīdharaḥ : itaś ca sarvais tvam eva namaskāryaḥ sarva-devātmakatvād iti stuvan svayam api namaskaroti vāyur iti |

GE07bhg4c__u:20219: 'pi punar api ca namo namas te |

GE07bhg4c__u:20225: pitāmahas tvaṃ tat-pitṛtvāt prapitāmahas tvaṃ bhavasi kaṅkaṇādiṣu kanakasyeva cid-acic-chaktimatas tava kāraṇasya vāyv-ādiṣu vyāptes tat tat
GE07bhg4c__u:20226: sarva-rūpas tvam ataḥ sarva-namasyo 'sīti mayā tvaṃ namasyase ity āha namo
GE07bhg4c__u:20229: namaḥ purastād atha pṛṣṭhatas te namo 'stu te sarvata eva sarva
GE07bhg4c__u:20230: ananta-vīryāmita-vikramas tvaṃ sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tato 'si sarvaḥ ||40||

GE07bhg4c__u:20233: he sarva sarvātman sarvāsu dikṣu tubhyaṃ namo 'stu |
GE07bhg4c__u:20234: sarvātmakam upapādayann āha anantaṃ vīryaṃ sāmarthyaṃ yasya tathā |

GE07bhg4c__u:20237: suvarṇam iva kaṭaka-kuṇḍalādi sva-kāryaṃ vyāpya vartase tataḥ sarva-svarūpo 'si ||40||
GE07bhg4c__u:20238: madhusūdanaḥ : tubhyaṃ purastād agra-bhāge namo 'stu tubhyaṃ puro namaḥ

GE07bhg4c__u:20244: ekaṃ vīryādhikaṃ manya uttaikaṃ śikṣayādhikam ity ukter bhīma-duryodhanayor anyeṣu caikaikaṃ vyavasthitam |
GE07bhg4c__u:20245: tvaṃ tu ananta-vīryaś cāmita-vikramaś ceti samastam ekaṃ padam |
GE07bhg4c__u:20247: sarvaṃ samastaṃ jagat samāpnoṣi samyag ekenaa sad-rūpeṇāpnoṣi
GE07bhg4c__u:20248: sarvātmanā vyāpnoṣi tatas tasmāt sarvo 'si tvad-atiriktaṃ kim api nāstīty
GE07bhg4c__u:20250: viśvanāthaḥ : sarvaṃ sva-kāryaṃ jagad āpnoṣi vyāpnoṣi svarṇam iva kaṭaka-kuṇḍalādikam atas tvam eva sarvaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c__u:20251: baladevaḥ : bhakty-atiśayena namaskāreṣv alaṃ bhāvam avidan bahukṛtvaḥ praṇamati namaḥ purastād iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:20252: he sarva ! purastāt pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvataś ca sthitāya te namo namo 'stu |

GE07bhg4c__u:20289: pramādāc citta-vikṣepāt praṇayena snehena vāpi kim uktam ity āha he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti
GE07bhg4c__u:20290: yac cāvahāsārtham parihāsārthaṃ vihāra-śayyāsana-bhojaneṣu vihāraḥ krīḍā vyāyāmo vā, śayyā tūlikādyāstaraṇa-viśeṣaḥ, āsanaṃ siṃhāsanādi |
GE07bhg4c__u:20291: bhojanaṃ bahūnāṃ paṅkāvaśanaṃ teṣu viṣaya-bhūteṣu asatkṛto 'si mayā paribhūto 'si

GE07bhg4c__u:20293: athavā tat-samakṣaṃ teṣāṃ sakhīnāṃ samakṣaṃ vā, he 'cyuta ! sarvadā nirvikāra ! tat sarvaṃ vacana-rūpam asat-karaṇa-rūpaṃ cāparādha-jātaṃ kṣāmaye kṣāmayāmi tvām

GE07bhg4c__u:20297: viśvanāthaḥ : hanta hantaitādṛśa-mahā-mahaiśvaryamat tvayy ahaṃ kṛta-mahāparādha-puñjo 'smīty anutāpam āviṣkurvann āha sakhetīti |

GE07bhg4c__u:20315: athavā tat samakṣaṃ teṣāṃ parihasatāṃ sakhīnāṃ samakṣaṃ purato 'si yadā sthitas tadā jātaṃ tat sarvam aparādha-sahasraṃ kṣāmaye |

GE07bhg4c__u:20319: kṛṣṇo bhagavān me sakhā mitram iti matvā niścitya tavedaṃ sahasra-śīrṣatvādi-lakṣaṇaṃ mahimānam ajānatānanubhavatā mayā pramādād anavadhānataḥ praṇayena sakhya-premṇā vā yat tvāṃ prati prasabhaṃ haṭhād uktam |

GE07bhg4c__u:20327: avahāsārthaṃ parihāsāyāsatkṛto 'si satya-vāk saralo niṣkapaṭas tvam ity evaṃ vyañjaka-śabdair avajñāto 'si |
GE07bhg4c__u:20328: ekaḥ sakhīn vinā vijane sthitas tat samakṣaṃ vā teṣāṃ parihasatāṃ sakhīnāṃ purato vā sthita ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:20330: sarva-vacana-rūpam asatkāra-rūpaṃ vāparādha-jātaṃ kṣāmaye kṣamasva prabho
GE07bhg4c__u:20336: pitāsi lokasya carācarasya tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān |
GE07bhg4c__u:20340: na vidyate pratimā upamā yasya so 'pratimaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:20341: tathāvidhaḥ prabhāvo yasya tava he apratima-prabhāva
GE07bhg4c__u:20342: | tvam asya carācarasya lokasya pitā janako 'si |
GE07bhg4c__u:20343: ataeva pūjyaś ca guruś ca guror api garīyān gurutaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:20349: asya carācarasya lokasya pitā janakas tvam asi |
GE07bhg4c__u:20353: ataeva na tvat-samo 'sty abhyadhikaḥ kuto 'nyo loka-traye 'pi |
GE07bhg4c__u:20355: apratima-prabhāva ! yasya samo 'pi nāsti dvitīyasya parameśvarasyābhāvāt
GE07bhg4c__u:20356: tasyādhiko 'nyaḥ kutaḥ syāt sarvathā na sambhāvyata evety arthaḥ ||43||
GE07bhg4c__u:20359: asya lokasya pitā pūjyo guruḥ śāstropadeṣṭā ca tvam asi |
GE07bhg4c__u:20360: ataḥ sarvaiḥ prakārair garīyān gurutaras tvam
GE07bhg4c__u:20361: | he 'pratima-prabhāva ! ato 'smin loka-traye nikhile 'pi jagati tvat-sama

GE07bhg4c__u:20364: śrutiś caivam āha na tat-samaś cābhyadhikaś ca dṛśyate iti ||43||
GE07bhg4c__u:20366: tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāyaṃ prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam |
GE07bhg4c__u:20367: piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuḥ priyaḥ priyāyārhasi deva soḍhum ||44||
GE07bhg4c__u:20374: atas tvaṃ mahāparādhaṃ soḍhuṃ kṣantum arhati |
GE07bhg4c__u:20375: kasya kva iva ? putrasyāparādhaṃ kṛpayā pitā yathā sahate |
GE07bhg4c__u:20377: priyaś ca priyāyā aparādhaṃ tat-priyārthaṃ yathā sahate tadvat ||44||
GE07bhg4c__u:20379: tasmāt praṇamya namaskṛtya tvāṃ praṇidhāya prakarṣeṇa nīcair dhṛtvā kāyaṃ daṇḍavad bhūmau patitveti yāvat
GE07bhg4c__u:20380: | prasādaye tvām īśam īḍyam sarva-stutyam aham aparādhī |
GE07bhg4c__u:20382: piteva putrasyāparādhaṃ sakheva sakhyur aparādhaṃ priyaḥ priyāyāḥ pativratāyā aparādhaṃ mamāparādhaṃ tvaṃ soḍhum kṣantum arhasi ananya-śaraṇatvān mama |
GE07bhg4c__u:20384: viśvanāthaḥ : kāyaṃ praṇidhāya bhūmau daṇḍavan nipātya priyāyārhasīti
GE07bhg4c__u:20387: kāyaṃ bhūmau praṇidhāya praṇamyeti sāṣṭāṅgaṃ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā |
GE07bhg4c__u:20390: sakheva sakhyur iti tu tadā mahaiśvaryaṃ vīkṣya svasmin dāsatva-mananāt |
GE07bhg4c__u:20393: adṛṣṭa-pūrvaṃ hṛṣito 'smi dṛṣṭvā bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ mano me |
GE07bhg4c__u:20394: tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ prasīda deveśa jagan-nivāsa ||45||
GE07bhg4c__u:20395: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ kṣamāpayitvā prārthayate adṛṣṭa-pūrvam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c__u:20396: he deva pūrvam adṛṣṭaṃ tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito hṛṣṭo 'smi |
GE07bhg4c__u:20397: tathā bhayena ca me manaḥ pravyathitaṃ pracalitam |
GE07bhg4c__u:20398: tasmān mama vyathā-nivṛntaye tad eva rūpaṃ darśaya |
GE07bhg4c__u:20399: he devaśa he jagannivāsa prasanno bhava ||45||
GE07bhg4c__u:20400: madhusūdanaḥ : evam aparādha-kṣamāṃ prārthya punaḥ prāg-rūpa-darśanaṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:20403: adṛṣṭa-pūrvaṃ pūrvam adṛṣṭaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito hṛṣṭo 'smi |

GE07bhg4c__u:20405: atas tad eva prācīnam eva mama prāṇāpekṣayāpi priyaṃ rūpaṃ me darśaya he deva he deveśa he jagan-nivāsa prasīda prāg-rūpa-darśana-rūpaṃ prasādaṃ me kuru ||45||
GE07bhg4c__u:20406: viśvanāthaḥ : yadyapy adṛṣṭa-pūrvam idaṃ te viśva-rūpātmakaṃ vapur dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito 'smi tad apy asya ghoratvād bhayena manaḥ pravyathitam abhūt |
GE07bhg4c__u:20407: tasmāt tad eva mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ mat-prāṇa-koṭy-adhika-priyaṃ

GE07bhg4c__u:20409: deveśeti tvaṃ sarvedvānām īśvaraḥ sarva-jagan-nivāso bhavasy eveti mayā pratītam iti bhāvaḥ

GE07bhg4c__u:20414: tvayi kṛṣṇe sattvena jñātam apīdam aiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvāhaṃ harṣito 'smi

GE07bhg4c__u:20417: ata idaṃ prārthayed evety ādi sarva-deva-niyantā tat-sarvādhāraḥ pareśas tvam asīti
GE07bhg4c__u:20418: mayā pratyakṣīkṛtam ataḥparaṃ tad-antarbhāvya tad eva mad-abhīṣṭaṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:20425: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva rūpaṃ viśeṣayann āha kirīṭinam iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:20426: kirīṭavantam gadāvantaṃ cakra-hastaṃ ca tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi |
GE07bhg4c__u:20432: tad anena śrī-kṛṣṇam arjunaḥ pūrvam api kirīṭādi-yuktam eva paśyatīti gamyate
GE07bhg4c__u:20433: | yat tu pūrvam uktaṃ viśva-rūpa-darśane kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca paśyāmīti |
GE07bhg4c__u:20435: yad vā etāvantaṃ kālaṃ yaṃ tvāṃ kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca suprasannam apaśyaṃ tam evedānīṃ tejo-rāśiṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ paśyāmībhy evam atra vacanasya vyaktir ity avirodhaḥ ||46||
GE07bhg4c__u:20436: madhusūdanaḥ : tad eva rūpaṃ vivṛṇoti kirīṭinam iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:20437: kirīṭavantam gadāvantaṃ cakra-hastaṃ ca tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmy ahaṃ tathaiva pūrvavad eva atas tenaiva rūpeṇa catur-bhujena vasudevātmajatvena bhava he idānīṃ

GE07bhg4c__u:24014: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vyatiriktaṃ tat-sākṣiṇam ātmānaṃ vetti |
GE07bhg4c__u:24015: sa tu mad-bhāvaṃ brahmatvam adhigacchati prāpnoti ||19||
GE07bhg4c__u:24016: madhusūdanaḥ : asminn adhyāye vaktavyatvena prastutam artha-trayam |
GE07bhg4c__u:24018: kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogasyeśvarādhīnatvaṃ ke vā guṇāḥ kathaṃ vā te
GE07bhg4c__u:24020: adhunā tu guṇebhyaḥ kathaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ muktasya ca kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti vaktavyam avaśiṣyate |
GE07bhg4c__u:24022: mithyā-jñānātmakatvād guṇānāṃ samyag-jñānāt tebhyo mokṣaṇam ity āha nānyam iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:24023: guṇebhyaḥ kārya-kāraṇa-viṣayākāra-pariṇatebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ yadā draṣṭā vicāra-kuśalaḥ sann anupaśyati vicāram anu na paśyati guṇā
GE07bhg4c__u:24027: pariṇatebhyaḥ paraṃ guṇa-tat-kāryāsaṃspṛṣṭaṃ tad-bhāsakam ādityam iva jala-tat-kampādy-asaṃspṛṣṭaṃ nirvikāraṃ sarva-sākṣiṇaṃ sarvatra samaṃ kṣetrajñam ekaṃ vetti |
GE07bhg4c__u:24029: vīśvāṇaṭḥaḥ : guṇa-kṛtaṃ saṃsāraṃ darśayitvā guṇātītaṃ mokṣaṃ darśayati nānyam iti dvābhyām
GE07bhg4c__u:24031: 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ draṣṭā jīvo yadā nānupaśyati, kintu guṇā eva sadaiva kartāra ity evam anupaśyati anubhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24032: guṇebhyaḥ paraṃ vyatirikam evātmānaṃ vetti tadā sa draṣṭā mad-bhāvaṃ mayi sāyujyam adhigacchati prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c__u:24033: tatra tādṛśa-jñānānantaram api mayi parāṃ bhaktiṃ kṛtvaiva ity upānta-ślokārtha-dṛṣṭyā jñeyam
GE07bhg4c__u:24034: baladevaḥ : evaṃ guṇa-vivekāt saṃsāram uktvā tad-vivekān mokṣam āha nānyam
GE07bhg4c__u:24037: pariṇatebhyo guṇebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ nānupaśyati guṇān kartĪn paśyaty ātmānaṃ guṇebhyaḥ parama-kartāraṃ vetti |
GE07bhg4c__u:24039: | ayam āśayaḥ -- na khalu vijñānānando viśuddho jīvo yuddha-yajñādi-duḥkhamaya-karmaṇāṃ kartā, kintu guṇamaya-dehendriyavān eva saṃstatheti guṇa-hetukatvād guṇa-niṣṭhaṃ tat-karma-kartṛtvaṃ na tu viśuddhātma-niṣṭham iti yadānupaśyati, tadā mad-bhāvam asaṃsāritvaṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:24046: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī deha-samudbhavān |
GE07bhg4c__u:24048: śrīdharaḥ : tataś ca guṇa-kṛta-sarvānartha-nivṛttyā kṛtārtho bhavatīty āha
GE07bhg4c__u:24050: dehādyākāraḥ samudbhavaḥ pariṇāmo yeṣāṃ te deha-samudbhavāḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24051: tān etāṃ trīn api guṇān atītyātikramya tat-kṛtair janmādibhir vimuktaḥ sann amṛtam aśnute paramānandaṃ prāpnoti ||20||
GE07bhg4c__u:24052: madhusūdanaḥ : katham adhigacchatīty ucyate - guṇān iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:24053: guṇān etān māyātmakās trīn sattva-rajas-tamo-nāmno deha-samudbhavān
GE07bhg4c__u:24054: dehotpatti-bīja-bhūtān atītya jīvann eva tattva-jñānena bādhitvā
GE07bhg4c__u:24055: janma-mṛtyu-jarā-duḥkhair janmanā mṛtyunā jarayā duḥkhaiś cādhyātmikādibhir māyā-mayair vimukto jīvann eva tat-sambandha-śūnyaḥ san vidvān amṛtaṃ mokṣam aśnute prāpnoti ||20||
GE07bhg4c__u:24056: viśvanāthaḥ : tataś ca so 'pi guṇātīta evocyata ity āha guṇān iti ||20||
GE07bhg4c__u:24057: baladevaḥ : mad-bhāva-padenoktam arthaṃ sphuṭayati guṇān iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:24060: dehotpādaāṃs trīn guṇān atītyollaṅghya janmādibhir vimukto 'mṛtam ātmānam aśnute 'nubhavati
GE07bhg4c__u:24066: kair liṅgais trīn guṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho |
GE07bhg4c__u:24067: kim-ācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate ||21||
GE07bhg4c__u:24068: śrīdharaḥ : guṇān etān atītyāmṛtam aśnuta ity etat śrutvā guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam ācāraṃ guṇātyayopāyaṃ ca samyag bubhutsur arjuna uvāca kair iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:24069: he prabho kair liṅgaiḥ kīdṛśair ātma-vyutpannaiś cihnair guṇātīto dehī
GE07bhg4c__u:24073: kathaṃ ca kenopāyena etāṃs trīn api guṇān atītya vartate |
GE07bhg4c__u:24075: madhusūdanaḥ : guṇān etān atītya jīvann evāmṛtam aśnuta ity etac chrutvā
GE07bhg4c__u:24076: guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam cācāraṃ ca guṇātyayopāyaṃ ca samyag bubhutsur arjuna uvāca kair iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:24077: etān guṇān atīto yaḥ sa kair liṅgair viśiṣṭo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c__u:24078: yair liṅgaiḥ sa jñātuṃ śakyas tāni me brūhīty ekaḥ praśnaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24080: bhṛtya-duḥkhaṃ bhagavataiva nivāraṇīyam iti sūcayan sambodhayati prabho
GE07bhg4c__u:24085: kathaṃ vā kena ca prakāreṇaitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate 'tikrāmatīti guṇātītatvopāyaḥ ka iti tṛtīyaḥ praśnaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c__u:24086: viśvanāthaḥ : sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādinā dvitīyādhyāye pṛṣṭam apy arthaṃ punas tato 'pi viśeṣa-bubhūtsayā pṛcchati kair liṅgaiḥ ity ekaḥ praśnaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24087: kaiś cihnais triguṇātītaḥ sa jñeya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24091: sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādau sthita-prajño guṇātītaḥ kathaṃ syād iti tadānīṃ na pṛṣṭam idānīṃ tu pṛṣṭam iti viśeṣaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c__u:24092: baladevaḥ : guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam ācāraṃ ca guṇātyaya-sādhanaṃ cārjunaḥ pṛcchati kair ity ardhakena
GE07bhg4c__u:24093: prathamaḥ praśnaḥ kaiś cihnair guṇātīto jñātuṃ śakya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24094: kim ācāra iti dvitīyaḥ sa kiṃ yatheṣṭācāro niyatācāro vety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24095: kathaṃ caitān iti tṛtīyaḥ kena sādhanena guṇān atyetīty arthaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c__u:24097: prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava |
GE07bhg4c__u:24098: na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati ||22||
GE07bhg4c__u:24099: śrīdharaḥ : sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā [Gītā 2.54] ity ādinā dvitīye
GE07bhg4c__u:24100: 'dhyāye pṛṣṭam api dattottaram api punar viśeṣa-bubhūtsayā pṛcchatīti jñātvā prakārāntareṇa tasya lakṣaṇādikaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca prakāśaṃ cety
GE07bhg4c__u:24103: prakāśaṃ ca sarva-dvāreṣu dehe 'sminn iti pūrvoktaṃ sattva-kāryam |
GE07bhg4c__u:24107: sarvāṇy api yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni svataḥ-prāptāni santi duḥkha-buddhyā
GE07bhg4c__u:24109: nivṛttāni ca santi sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati, guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate iti caturthenānvayaḥ
GE07bhg4c__u:24110: madhusūdanaḥ : sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā [Gītā 2.54] ity ādinā pṛṣṭam api prajahāti yadā kāmān [Gītā 2.55] ity ādinā dattottaram api punaḥ prakārāntareṇa bubhūtsamānaḥ pṛcchatīty avadhāya prakārāntareṇa tasya
GE07bhg4c__u:24111: lakṣaṇādikaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca prakāśaṃ cety ādi pañcabhiḥ ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24112: yas tāvat kair liṅgair yukto guṇātīto bhavatīti praśnas tasyottaraṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c__u:24117: sarvāṇy api guṇa-kāryāṇi yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni sva-sāmagrī-vaśād udbhūtāni santi duḥkha-rūpāṇy
GE07bhg4c__u:24119: | tathā vināśa-sāmagrī-vaśān nivṛttāni tāni sukha-rūpāṇy api santi sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati na kāmayate svapnavan mithyātva-niścayāt |
GE07bhg4c__u:24120: etādṛśa-dveṣa-rāga-śūnyo yaḥ sa guṇātīta ucyata iti caturtha-śloka-gatenānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24121: idaṃ ca svātma-pratyakṣaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ svārtham eva na parārtham |
GE07bhg4c__u:24122: na hi svāśritau dveṣa-tad-abhāvau rāga-tad-abhāvau ca paraḥ pratyetum arhati ||22||
GE07bhg4c__u:24123: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra kair liṅgair guṇātīto bhavatīti prathama-praśnasyottaram āha prakāśaṃ ca sarva-dvāreṣu dehe 'smin prakāśa upajāyate iti sattva-kāryam |
GE07bhg4c__u:24127: sarvāṇy api yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni svataḥ-prāptāni duḥkha-buddhyā yo na dveṣṭi |
GE07bhg4c__u:24129: etāni nivṛttāni ca sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati, sa guṇātīta ucyate iti caturthenānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24131: baladevaḥ : yadyapi sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādinā pṛṣṭam idaṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:24132: prajahāti yadā kāmān ity ādinottaritaṃ ca, tathāpi viśeṣa-jijñāsayā
GE07bhg4c__u:24133: pṛcchatīti vidhāntareṇa tasya lakṣāṇādīny āha bhagavān prakāśaṃ cety ādi pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24134: tatraikena lakṣaṇaṃ sva-saṃvedyam āha prakāśaṃ sattva-kāryaṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:24135: pravṛttiṃ rajaḥ-kāryaṃ mohaṃ tamaḥ-kāryaṃ etāni trīṇi sampravṛttāny
GE07bhg4c__u:24136: utpādaka-sāmagrī-vaśāt prāptāni duḥkha-rūpāṇy api duḥkha-buddhyā yo na dveṣṭi, vināśaka-sāmagrī-vaśān nivṛttāni vinaṣṭāni tāni sukha-rūpāny api
GE07bhg4c__u:24140: rāga-tad-abhāvau ca paro na veditum arhatīti sva-saṃvedyam idaṃ lakṣaṇam ||22||
GE07bhg4c__u:24142: udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate |
GE07bhg4c__u:24143: guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate ||23||
GE07bhg4c__u:24144: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ sva-saṃvedyaṃ guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam uktvā
GE07bhg4c__u:24145: para-saṃvedyaṃ tasya lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ dvitīya-praśnasya kim ācāra ity
GE07bhg4c__u:24147: udāsīnavat sākṣitayāsīnaḥ sthitaḥ san guṇair guṇa-kāryaiḥ sukha-duḥkhādibhir na yo vicālyate svarūpān na pracyavate api tu guṇā eva svakāryeṣu vartante |
GE07bhg4c__u:24148: etair mama sambandha eva nāstīti viveka-jñānena yas tuṣṇīm avatiṣṭhati |
GE07bhg4c__u:24152: viśvanāthaḥ : kim ācāraḥ iti dvitīya-praśnasyottaram āha udāsīnavad iti
GE07bhg4c__u:24154: guṇa-kāryaiḥ sukha-duḥkhādibhir yo na vicālyate svarūpāvasthān na cyavate, api tu guṇa eva sva-sva-kāryeṣu vartanta ity eveti ebhir mama sambandha eva nāstīti viveka-jñānena yas tūṣṇīm avatiṣṭhati parasmaipadam ārṣam |
GE07bhg4c__u:24156: guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate iti guṇātītasya etāni cihnāni etān ācārāṃś ca dṛṣṭvaiva guṇātīto vaktavyo na tu guṇātītatvopapatti-vāvadūko guṇātīto vaktavya iti bhāvaḥ ||23-25||
GE07bhg4c__u:24157: baladevaḥ : atha para-saṃvedya-lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ kim ācāraḥ iti
GE07bhg4c__u:24159: udāsīno madhyastho yathā vivādinoḥ pakṣagrahaiḥ sva-mādhyasthyān na vicālyate, tayā
GE07bhg4c__u:24160: sukha-duḥkhādi-bhāvena parṇatair guṇair yo nātmāvasthitair vicālyate,
GE07bhg4c__u:24162: mama tair na sambandha iti niścitya tūṣṇīm avatiṣṭhate |
GE07bhg4c__u:24174: tulyo nindā cātmanaḥ saṃstutiś ca yasya ||24||
GE07bhg4c__u:24178: kasmād evaṃ yasmāt svasthaḥ svasminn ātmany eva sthito dvaita-darśana-śūnyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c__u:24182: ata eva tulye priyāpriye sukha-duḥkha-sādhane yasya
GE07bhg4c__u:24187: yasya sa guṇātīta ucyata iti dvitīya-gatenānvayaḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c__u:24191: sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥṅ same anātma-dharmatvāt tulye sukha-duḥkhe yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24192: samāny anupādeyatayā tulyāni losṭrādīni yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24199: ya īdṛśo guṇatītaḥ sa ucyata iti dvitīyenānvayaḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c__u:24207: sarvān dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthān ārambhān udyamān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24213: śabda-rūpe mānāpamānau tu śabdam antareṇāpi kāya-mano-vyāpāra-viśeṣāv iti bhedaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24214: atra pa-kāra-va-kārayoḥ pāṭha-vikalpe 'py arthaḥ sa eva |
GE07bhg4c__u:24220: ārabhyanta ity ārambhāḥ karmāṇi tān sarvān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c__u:24222: udāsīnavad āsīna ity ādy-ukta-prakārācāro guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate |
GE07bhg4c__u:24223: yad uktam upekṣakatvādi tad-vidyodayāt pūrvaṃ yatna-sādhyaṃ vidyādhikāriṇā sādhanatvenānuṣṭheyam utpannāyāṃ tu vidyāyāṃ jīvan-muktasya
GE07bhg4c__u:24224: guṇātītasyoktaṃ dharma-jātam ayatna-siddhaṃ lakṣaṇatvena tiṣṭhaty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c__u:24228: mānāpamānau tu kāyamanovyāpāreṇāpi syātām iti bhedaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24231: ya īdṛśo guṇātītaḥ undāsīnavat ity ādy uktā yasyācārḥ parair api saṃvedyāḥ sa guṇātīto bodhyo na tu tad-upapatti-vāvadūka iti bhāvaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c__u:24235: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ caitān trīn guṇān ativartate iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:24238: mām eva parameśvaram avyabhicāreṇa ekāntena bhakti-yogena yaḥ sevate sa etān guṇān samatītya
GE07bhg4c__u:24239: samyag atikramya brahma-bhūyāya brahma-bhāvāya mokṣāya kalpate samartho
GE07bhg4c__u:24241: madhusūdanaḥ : adhunā katham etān guṇān ativartata iti tṛtīya-praśnasya
GE07bhg4c__u:24247: dvādaśādhyāyoktena yaḥ sevate sadā cintayati sa mad-bhakta etān prāg-uktān
GE07bhg4c__u:24252: viśvanāthaḥ : kathaṃ caitān trīn guṇān ativartate iti
GE07bhg4c__u:24255: mām eva śyāmasundarākāraṃ parameśvaraṃ bhakti-yogena yaḥ sevate sa eva
GE07bhg4c__u:24256: brahma-bhūyāya brahmatvāya brahmānubhavāya yāvat bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ
GE07bhg4c__u:24257: iti mad-vākye ekayeti viśeṣaṇopanyāsāt mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te ity atrāpi eva-kāra-prayogāt bhaktyā vinā prakārāntareṇa
GE07bhg4c__u:24261: jñānaṃ ca mayi sannyaset iti jñānināṃ carama-daśāyāṃ jñānasyāpi
GE07bhg4c__u:24263: bhakti-yogasya tu kvāpi nyāsāśravaṇāt bhakti-yoga eva so 'vyabhicāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:24265: iva jñāna-yogam api parityājya yady avyabhicāreṇa kevalenaiva bhaktiyogena
GE07bhg4c__u:24266: sevate, tarhi jñānī api guṇātīto bhavati, nānyathā |
GE07bhg4c__u:24267: ananya-bhaktas tu nirguṇo mad-apāśrayaḥ ity ekādaśokter guṇātīto bhavaty eva |
GE07bhg4c__u:24268: atra idaṃ tattvaṃ VEṛṣE ity atrāsaṅginaḥ karmiṇo jñānino vā sāttvikatvenaiva sādhakatvāvagates tat-sāhacaryāt nirguṇo mad-apāśrayaḥ iti bhaktaḥ sādhaka
GE07bhg4c__u:24270: tataś ca jñānī jñāna-siddhaḥ sann eva sāttvikatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:24272: bhaktas tu sādhaka-daśām ārabhyaiva guṇātīto bhavatīty artho labhyate |
GE07bhg4c__u:24274: | mām eveśvaraṃ nārāyaṇam avyabhicāreṇa bhakti-yogena dvādaśādyāyoktena yaḥ sevata iti madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāś ca vyācakṣate ||26||
GE07bhg4c__u:24275: baladevaḥ : kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartata iti
GE07bhg4c__u:24278: nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ karāram ity ādy-uktyā yo guṇa-puruṣa-viveka-khyātim avāpa tayaiva tasyā
GE07bhg4c__u:24279: guṇātyayo na saṃsidhyati, kintu tadvān api yo māṃ kṛṣṇam eva
GE07bhg4c__u:24282: bhakti-yogena sevate śrayati sa etān duratyayān api guṇān atītyākramya brahma-bhūyāya kalpate guṇāṣṭa-viśiṣṭatvāya[*ENDNOTE] nija-dharmāya yogyo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c__u:24285: tūkta eva prk, tathā ca bhakti-śiraskayaiva tad-viveka-khyātyā jīvasya
GE07bhg4c__u:24286: svarūpa-lābho, na tu kevalayā tayety uktam |
GE07bhg4c__u:24287: yat tu brahma-bhūyāya ity anena mad-rūpatāṃ sa yātīti pārtha-sārathinopadiṣṭam iti vyācaṣṭe

GE07bhg4c__u:26684: pretān bhūtagaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c__u:26685: śrīdharaḥ : sāttvikādi-bhedam eva kārya-bhedena prapañcayati yajanta iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:26686: sāttvikā janāḥ sattva-prakṛtīn devān eva yajante pūjayanti |
GE07bhg4c__u:26687: rājasās tu rajaḥ-prakṛtīn yakṣān rakṣasāṃś ca yajante |
GE07bhg4c__u:26688: etebhyo 'nye vilakṣaṇās tāmasā janās tāmasān eva pretān bhūta-gaṇāṃś ca yajante |
GE07bhg4c__u:26691: madhusūdanaḥ : śraddhā jñātā satī niṣṭhāṃ jñāpayiṣyati |
GE07bhg4c__u:26692: kenopāyena sā jñāyatām ity apekṣite deva-pūjādikārya-liṅgenānumeyety āha yajanta iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:26693: janāḥ śāstrīya-viveka-hīnā ye svābhāvikyā śraddhayā devān vasu-rudrādīn
GE07bhg4c__u:26695: ye ca yakṣān kuverādīn rakṣāṃsi ca rākṣasān nirṛti-prabhṛtīn rājasān yajante te 'nye rājasā jñeyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26696: ye ca pretān viprādayaḥ svadharmāt pracyutā deha-pātād ūrdhvaṃ vāyavīyaṃ deham āpannā ulkāmukha-kaṭa-pūtanādi-saṃjñāḥ pretā bhavantīti manūktān piśāca-viśeṣān vā bhūta-gaṇāṃś ca sapta-mātṛkādīṃś ca tāmasān yajante te 'nye tāmasā jñeyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26697: anya iti padaṃ triṣv api vailakṣaṇya-dyotanāya sambadhyate ||4||
GE07bhg4c__u:26698: viśvanāthaḥ : uktam arthaṃ spaṣṭayati sāttvikāntaḥ-karaṇāḥ sāttvikyā śraddhayā sāttvika-śāstra-vidhinā sāttvikān devān eva yajante |
GE07bhg4c__u:26700: evaṃ rājasā rājasāntaḥ-karaṇā ity ādi vivaritavyam ||4||
GE07bhg4c__u:26701: baladevaḥ : kārya-bhedena sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ prapañcayati yajanta iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:26702: śāstrīya-viveka-saṃvid-vihīnā ye janāḥ svabhāva-jayā śraddhayā devān sāttvikān vasu-rudrādīn yajante te 'nye rājasāḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26706: deha-pātottara-labdha-vāyavīya-dehā ulkāmukha-kaṭa-pūtanādi-saṃjñāḥ pretā manūktāḥ piśāca-viśeṣā veti vyākhyātāraś cāt sapta-mātṛkādayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26707: evam ālasyāt tyakta-veda-vidhīnāṃ svabhāvān sāttvikādyā nirūpitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26708: ete ca balavad vaidika-sat-prasaṅgāt svabhāvān vijitya kadācid vede 'py adhikṛto bhavantīti bodhyam ||4||
GE07bhg4c__u:26710: aśāstra-vihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26714: śrīdharaḥ : rājasa-tāmaseṣv api punar viśeṣāntaram āha aśāstra-vihitam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c__u:26719: ye punar atyantaṃ manda-bhāgyās te gatānugatyā pāṣaṇḍa-saṅgena ca tad-ācārānuvartinaḥ santo 'śāstra-vihitaṃ ghoraṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:26729: bhūtānāṃ pṛthivy-ādīnāṃ grāmaṃ samūhaṃ karśayanto vṛthaiva upavāsādibhiḥ kṛśaṃ kurvanto 'cetaso 'vivekinaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26732: evaṃ ye tapaś caranti tān āsura-niścayān |
GE07bhg4c__u:26734: madhusūdanaḥ : evam anādṛta-śāstrāṇāṃ sattvādi-niṣṭhā kāryato nirṇītā |
GE07bhg4c__u:26735: tatra kecid rājasa-tāmasā api prāg-bhavīya-puṇya-paripākāt sāttvikā bhūtvā śāstrīya-sādhane 'dhikriyante |
GE07bhg4c__u:26737: durdaiva-paripāka-prāpta-durjana-saṅgādi-doṣeṇa ca rājasa-tāmasatāṃ na muñcanti te śāstrīya-mārgād bhraṣṭā asan-mārgānusaraṇeneha loke paratra ca
GE07bhg4c__u:26739: aśāstra-vihitaṃ śāstreṇa vedena pratyakṣeṇānumitena vā na vihitam
GE07bhg4c__u:26740: aśāstreṇa buddhādy-āgamena bodhitaṃ vā ghoraṃ parasyātmanaḥ pīḍā-karaṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:26741: tapas tapta-śilā-rohaṇādi tapyante kurvanti ye janāḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26743: dhārmikatva-khyāpanam ahaṃkāro 'ham eva śreṣṭha iti durabhimānas tābhyāṃ samyag yuktāḥ, yogasya samyaktvam anāyāsena viyoga-jananā-sāmarthyaṃ kāme
GE07bhg4c__u:26755: bhoktṛ-rūpeṇa sthitaṃ bhogyasya śarīrasya kṛśīkaraṇena kṛśīkurvanta eva |
GE07bhg4c__u:26761: vedārtha-virodhī niścayo yeṣāṃ tān manuṣyatvena pratīyamānān apy asura-kārya-kāritvād asurān viddhi jānīhi pariharaṇāya |
GE07bhg4c__u:26764: asuratva-jāti-rahitānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ karmaṇaivāsuratvāt tān asurān viddhīti sākṣān noktam iti ca draṣṭavyam
GE07bhg4c__u:26765: viśvanāthaḥ : yas tvayā pṛṣṭhaṃ ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya
GE07bhg4c__u:26766: kāma-bhoga-rahitāḥ śraddhayā yajante teṣāṃ kā niṣṭhā iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:26767: tasyottaram adhunā śṛṇv ity āha aśāstreti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c__u:26768: ghoraṃ prāṇi-bhayaṅkaraṃ tapas tapyante kurvantīty-upalakṣaṇam idaṃ japa-yāgādikam apy aśāstrīyaṃ kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c__u:26769: kāmācaraṇa-rāhityaṃ śraddhānvitatvaṃ ca svata eva labhyate |
GE07bhg4c__u:26777: bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ grāmaṃ samūhaṃ karśayantaḥ kṛśī-kurvanto māṃ ca mad-aṃśa-bhūtaṃ jīvaṃ ca duḥkhayantaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26778: āsūya-niścayān asurāṇām eva niṣṭhāyāṃ sthitām ity arthaḥ ||5-6||
GE07bhg4c__u:26779: baladevaḥ : veda-bāhyānāṃ kadācid api durgater nistāro neti pūrvādhyāyoktaṃ dṛḍhayann āha aśāstreti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c__u:26781: veda-viruddhena svāgamena vihitaṃ ghoraṃ para-pīḍakaṃ tapo ye tapyante
GE07bhg4c__u:26782: kurvanti kāma-rāgo viṣaya-spṛhā balaṃ ca mayā śakyam etat siddhaiḥ kartum iti durāgrahaḥ śarīrastham ārambhakatayā śarīraṃ sthitaṃ bhūta-grāmaṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:26786: niścayenāsurān viddhīti pūrvoktānāṃ teṣāṃ durgatir avarjanīyaiveti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26787: svabhāvajayā śraddhayā yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-pretādīn yajatāṃ balavad-vaidika-sad-anugrahe sati
GE07bhg4c__u:26789: devān yajatāṃ tu vastutaḥ sāttvikatvāt tad-anugrahe sati śāstrīyā sulabheti sthitam ||5-6||
GE07bhg4c__u:26791: āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26792: yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu ||7||
GE07bhg4c__u:26793: śrīdharaḥ : āhārādi-bhedād api sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ darśayitum āha āhāras tv ity ādi-trayodaśabhiḥ
GE07bhg4c__u:26794: sarvasyāpi janasya ya āhāro 'nnādi sa tu yathāyathaṃ trividhaḥ priyo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c__u:26795: tathā yajña-tapo-dānāni ca trividhāni bhavanti teṣāṃ vakṣyamānaṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c__u:26797: sattva-vṛddhau yatna-kartavya ity etad arthaṃ kathyate ||7||
GE07bhg4c__u:26798: madhusūdanaḥ : ye sāttvikās te devā ye tu rājasās tāmasāś ca te viparyastatvād asurā iti sthite sāttvikānām ādānāya rājasa-tāmasānāṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:26799: hānāya cāhāra-yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ traividhyam āha āhāra iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:26801: āhāro 'pi sarvasya priyas trividha eva bhavati sarvasya triguṇātmakatvena caturthyāṃ vidhāyā asaṃbhavāt |
GE07bhg4c__u:26802: yathā dṛṣṭārtha āhāras trividhas tathā yajña-tapo-dānānya-dṛṣṭārthāny api trividhāni |
GE07bhg4c__u:26803: tatra yajñaṃ vyākhyāsyāmo dravya-devatā-tyāgaḥ iti kalpa-kārair
GE07bhg4c__u:26805: sa ca yajatinā juhotinā ca coditatvena yāgo homaś ceti dvividha uttiṣṭhad-dhomā vaṣaṭ-kāra-prayogāntā
GE07bhg4c__u:26813: āhāra-yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ sāttvika-rājasa-tāmasa-bhedaṃ mayā vyākhyāyamānam imaṃ śṛṇu ||7||
GE07bhg4c__u:26814: viśvanāthaḥ : tad evaṃ ye śāstra-vidhi-tyāginaḥ kāma-cāreṇa vartante pūrvādhyāyoktā ye cāsminn adhyāye āsura-śāstra-vidhinā
GE07bhg4c__u:26815: yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-pretādīn yajante, ye cāśāstrīyaṃ tapa-ādikaṃ kurvanti te sarve āsura-sarga-madhya-gatā eva bhavantīti prakaraṇārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26816: tathāpy āhārādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇānāṃ traividhyāt tadvatāṃ yathā-yogaṃ daivam āsuraṃ ca
GE07bhg4c__u:26817: sargaṃ svayam eva vivicya jānīty āha āhāras tv ity ādi trayodaśabhiḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c__u:26818: baladevaḥ : evaṃ sthite tad-āhārādīnām api traividhyam āha āhāras tv iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:26819: śraddhāvat sarvasya priyo 'nnādir āhāro 'pi trividho bhavati |
GE07bhg4c__u:26824: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvika-priyāḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c__u:26825: śrīdharaḥ : tatrāhāra-traividhyam āha āyur iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26858: etair liṅgaiḥ sāttvika jñeyāḥ sāttvikatvam abhilaṣadbhiś caita ādeyā ity arthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c__u:26859: viśvanāthaḥ : sāttvikāhāravatām āyur vardhata iti prasiddhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26861: rasyā iti kevala guḍādīnāṃ rasyatve 'pi rūkṣatvam ata āha
GE07bhg4c__u:26866: hṛd-udarādy-ahitatvam ata āha hṛdyā hṛd-udara-hitā iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:26869: sāttvika-loka-priyā jñeyās teṣāṃ priyatve saty eva sāttvikatvaṃ ca jñeyam |
GE07bhg4c__u:26870: kiṃ ca guṇa-catuṣṭayavattve 'pi apāvitrye sati sāttvika-priyatādarśanād
GE07bhg4c__u:26871: atra pavitrā ity api viśeṣaṇaṃ deyam |
GE07bhg4c__u:26874: baladevaḥ : tatra sāttvikāhāram āha āyuri iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:26881: śāli-godhūmādayaḥ sāttvikānāṃ priyās tair upādeyā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26905: madhusūdanaḥ : ati-śabdaḥ kaṭv-ādiṣu saptasv api yojanīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26919: etair liṅgaiḥ rājasā jñeyāḥ sāttvikaiś caita upekṣaṇīyā ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c__u:26920: viśvanāthaḥ : ati-śabdaḥ kaṭv-ādiṣu saptasv api sambadhyate |
GE07bhg4c__u:26935: ati-kaṭur iti tikto nimbādir na ca maricādis tasya tīkṣṇa-śabdenokter
GE07bhg4c__u:26937: khyāto 'titīkṣṇo marīcy-ādir atirukṣaḥ kaṅgukādir atidāhī rājikādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26942: yāta-yāmaṃ gata-rasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat |
GE07bhg4c__u:26945: yāto yāmaḥ praharo yasya pakvasyaudanādes tad yāta-yāmam |
GE07bhg4c__u:26956: yāta-yāmaṃ pakvaṃ sat praharādi-vyavahita-modanādi śaityaṃ prāptam |
GE07bhg4c__u:26966: etādṛśaṃ yad bhojanaṃ bhojyaṃ tat tāmasasya priyaṃ sāttvikair atidūrād upekṣaṇīyam ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c__u:26989: viśvanāthaḥ : yāto yāmaḥ praharo yasya pakvasyaudanādes tad yāta-yāmaṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:26998: tataś caivaṃ paryālocya sva-hitaiṣibhiḥ sāttvika āhāraḥ sevya iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:26999: vaiṣṇavais tu so 'pi bhagavad-aniveditas tyājya eva |
GE07bhg4c__u:27007: paryuṣitaṃ pūrve 'hni rāddham ucchiṣṭaṃ guror anyeṣāṃ bhuktāvaśiṣṭam amedhyam apavitraṃ kalañjādi |
GE07bhg4c__u:27012: yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c__u:27014: tatra sāttvikaṃ yajñam āha aphalākāṅkṣibhir iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:27015: phalākāṅkṣā-rahitaiḥ puruṣair vidhinādiṣṭa āvaśyakatayā vihito yo yajña ijyate 'nuṣṭhīyate sa sāttviko yajñaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:27019: nānyat phalaṃ sādhanīyam ity evaṃ manaḥ samādhāyaikāgraṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c__u:27020: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ krama-prāptaṃ trividhaṃ yajñam āha aphaleti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:27024: jīvanādi-nimitta-saṃyogena coditaḥ sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsambhave pratinidhy-ādy-upādānenāmukhya-kalpenāpy anuṣṭheyo nityaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:27025: tatra sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsambhave 'pi pratinidhim upādāyāvaśyaṃ yaṣṭavyam eva
GE07bhg4c__u:27028: kāmya-prayoga-vimukhair vidhi-dṛṣṭo yathā-śāstraṃ niścito yo yajña ijyate
GE07bhg4c__u:27031: viśvanāthaḥ : atha yajñasya traividhyam āha aphalākāṅkṣibhir iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:27032: phalākāṅkṣā-rāhitye kathaṃ yajñe pravṛttir ata āha -- yaṣṭavyam eveti |
GE07bhg4c__u:27033: svānuṣṭheyatvena śāstroktatvād avaśya-kartavyam etad iti manaḥ samādhāya
GE07bhg4c__u:27034: baladevaḥ : atha yajña-traividhyam āha aphaleti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:27036: phalecchā-śūnyair yo yajña ijyate kriyate vidhi-dṛṣṭo vidhi-vākyāj jātaḥ sa sāttvikaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:27037: nanu phalecchāṃ vinā tatra kathaṃ pravṛttis tatrāha yaṣṭavyam eveti |
GE07bhg4c__u:27038: māṃ prati vedenoktatvāt tat yajanam eva kāryaṃ, na tu tena phalaṃ sādhyam iti manaḥ samādhāyaikāgraṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c__u:27040: abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat |
GE07bhg4c__u:27041: ijyate bharata-śreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam ||12||
GE07bhg4c__u:27043: phalam abhisandhāyoddiśya tu yad ijyate yajñaḥ kriyate |
GE07bhg4c__u:27047: madhusūdanaḥ : phalaṃ kāmyaṃ svargādi abhisandhāyoddiśya na tv
GE07bhg4c__u:27054: 'pi pāralaukika-phalānabhisandhāne 'pi dambhārtham eveti vikalpena dvau pakṣau |
GE07bhg4c__u:27055: pāralaukika-phalārtham apy aihalaukika-dambhārtham apīti samuccayenaikaḥ pakṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:27058: yathā-śāstraṃ yo yajño 'nuṣṭhīyate taṃ yajñaṃ rājasaṃ
GE07bhg4c__u:27062: baladevaḥ : phalaṃ svargādikam abhisandhāya yad ijyate dambhārhtaṃ vā
GE07bhg4c__u:27067: śrīdharaḥ : tāmasaṃ yajñam āha vidhi-hīnam iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:27069: śāstrokta-vidhi-śūnyam asṛṣṭānnaṃ brāhmaṇādibhyo na sṛṣṭaṃ na niṣpāditam
GE07bhg4c__u:27073: śraddhā-śūnyaṃ ca yajñaṃ tāmasaṃ paricakṣate kathayanti śiṣṭāḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c__u:27074: madhusūdanaḥ : yathā-śāstra-bodhita-viparītam anna-dāna-hīnaṃ svarato varṇataś ca mantra-hīnaṃ yathokta-dakṣiṇā-hīnam ṛtvig-dveṣādinā
GE07bhg4c__u:27082: tāmase tv ayathā-śāstrānuṣṭhānān na kim apy apūrvam astīty atiśayaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c__u:27084: baladevaḥ : vidhīti asṛṣṭānnam anna-dāna-rahitaṃ mantra-hīnaṃ svarato varṇataś ca hīnena mantraṇopetaṃ śraddhā-virahitaṃ ṛtvig-vidveṣāt ||13||
GE07bhg4c__u:27086: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate ||14||
GE07bhg4c__u:27087: śrīdharaḥ : tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ darśayituṃ prathamaṃ tāvat
GE07bhg4c__u:27088: śārīrādi-bhedena tasya traividhyam āha devety ādi tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:27091: deva-brāhmaṇādi-pūjanaṃ śaucādikaṃ ca śārīraṃ śarīra-nirvartyaṃ tapa ucyate ||14||
GE07bhg4c__u:27093: śārīra-vācika-mānasa-bhedena tasya travidhyam āha tribhiḥ deveti |
GE07bhg4c__u:27102: ārjavam akauṭilyaṃ bhāva-saṃśuddhi-śabdena mānase tapasi vakṣyati |
GE07bhg4c__u:27112: pañcaite tasya hetava iti hi vakṣyati |
GE07bhg4c__u:27114: viśvanāthaḥ : tapasas traividhyaṃ vadana prathamaṃ sāttvikasya tapasas
GE07bhg4c__u:27116: baladevaḥ : krama-prāptasya tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ vaktuṃ tasyādau śārīrādi-bhāvena traividhyam āha deveti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c__u:27125: anudvega-karaṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priya-hitaṃ ca yat |
GE07bhg4c__u:27127: śrīdharaḥ : vācikaṃ tapa āha anudvegakaram iti |
GE07bhg4c__u:27128: udvegaṃ bhayaṃ na karotīty anudvegakaraṃ vākyam |
GE07bhg4c__u:27132: svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ vedābhyāsaś ca vāṅ-mayaṃ vācā nirvartyaṃ tapaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c__u:27133: madhusūdanaḥ : anudvega-karaṃ na kasyacid duḥkha-karaṃ, satyaṃ

GE07bhg4c__u:29601: na caivaṃ sati tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya iti śruti-virodhaḥ
GE07bhg4c__u:29603: na hi kāṣṭhaiḥ pacati ity ukte jvālānām asādhyanatvam uktaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c__u:29604: kiṃ ca yasya deve parā bhaktir yathā deve tathā gurau |
GE07bhg4c__u:29605: tasyaite kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ || (ŚvetU 6.23)
GE07bhg4c__u:29606: dehānte devaḥ paraṃ brahma tārakaṃ vyacaṣṭe |
GE07bhg4c__u:29607: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhya ity ādi-śruti-smṛti-purāṇa-vacanāny evaṃ sati samañjasāni bhavanti
GE07bhg4c__u:29608: tasmāt bhagavad-bhaktir eva mokṣa-hetur iti siddham ||
GE07bhg4c__u:29610: sa eva paramānandas tayā prīṇātu mādhavaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c__u:29614: tattvaṃ prepsur upaiti kiṃ guru-kṛpā-pīyūṣa-dṛṣṭiṃ vinā |
GE07bhg4c__u:29615: ambu svāñjalinā nirasya jaladher āditsur antarmaṇī nāvarteṣu na kiṃ nimajjati janaḥ sat-karṇa-dhāraṃ vinā ||
GE07bhg4c__u:29618: Baladeva: evaṃ ca sati sva-putra-vijayādi-spṛhāṃ parityajety āha yatreti |
GE07bhg4c__u:29622: yatra pārthas tvat-pitṛ-svasṛ-putro narāvatāraḥ kṛṣṇaikāntī dhanurdharo
GE07bhg4c__u:29632: | tan na - man-manā bhava mad-bhakta ity ādeḥ, sarva-dharmān parityajya ity ādeś copadeśas tasmāc catūrṇāṃ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca dharmā
GE07bhg4c__u:29633: hṛd-viśuddhi-hetutayā loka-saṅgrahārthatayā ceha nirūpitā ity eva suṣṭhu ||78||
GE07bhg4c__u:29635: kṣipraṃ prasādanī viṣṇor ity aṣṭādaśato matam ||
GE07bhg4c__u:29637: sphītaṃ sad-guṇa-vṛndais tad atra gītaṃ paraṃ tattvam ||
GE07bhg4c__u:29638: yad icchā-tariṃ prāpya gītāpayodhau nyamajjaṃ gṛhītāti-citrārtha-ratnam |
